p: The sample consisted of 120 participants who completed the questionnaire either in the paper-and-pencil form ( n = 40; 33.3%) or the online version ( n = 80; 66.7%). The neutrally formulated text was read by 66 people (55.0%), while 54 people (45.0%) received the humorous text as their intervention. There are no significant differences in sample characteristics between the two different methods of data collection, or between the two interventions.
